name: ROCPAIN: Rock Paper Scissors
description:
A paper airplane fights against Rock, Paper and Scissors.
The ROCPAIN gameplay is inspired on the rock-paper-scissors hand game, and like the original hand game, each enemy only its destroyed with the right shot.
A new way to play shooting games that will challenge your skills.
Journey through new worlds, win the challenges, unlock achievements and make as many points as you can.

2 Levels
4 Difficulty modes
24 Achievements
Leaderboards
